title: WTT T206 Fred Clarke HOF Portrait Brown Hindu SGC10
author: wolf441

posts.post_title: WTT T206 Fred Clarke HOF Portrait Brown Hindu SGC10
posts.post_content:
I recently picked up this beauty and although I need the HOF'er Clarke for my T206 set, I already have a Brown Hindu. I am looking to trade this T206 Fred Clarke Portrait with Brown Hindu back for another T206 rare back common of similar grade (SGC or PSA are both fine).

I'm interested in the following T206 backs:

Black Lenox
Red Hindu
Carolina Brights
Piedmont 350-460 Factory 42

I'd also consider trading for a higher profile T206 Hall of Famer with a common back. I'm looking for any of the following:

Cobb (all variations)
Johnson (portrait)
Mathewson (portrait)
Cy Young (portrait or glove shows)
Lajoie (portrait or batting)

Please PM with your trade proposals if you are interested. I'd also consider the Elberfield (port-Wash), Dahlen (Brooklyn) or Lundgren (Chicago) variations.

Thanks for looking,

Steve

Thanks to everyone for their offers. So far, still no match. Please PM me if you are interested in trading for this T206 HOF Hindu back. I'd also consider some additional Hall of Famers (Keeler, Waddell) as well as some Southern Leaguers.

Steve

Thanks for the offers thus far. I've received 3 offers in particular that were close to a match, but we couldn't pull the trigger. 

Please PM or email me at [url]woelfmansteve@aol.com[/url] if you are interested in this T206 Fred Clarke Portrait with Brown Hindu back. 

All offers are welcome (including scans in your offers would be appreciated). I am just looking for equal value and to pick up another T206 or T206s toward my set. If I don't find a suitable trade match in the next few days, I will sell the Clarke Hindu via ebay. 

Thanks for looking,

Steve
